did.unittitle: J. Walter Thompson Company. Chicago Office. Marketing Vertical File, 1937-1998 and undated

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: J. Walter Thompson Company. Chicago Office

did.abstract: Founded in 1864, the J. Walter Thompson Company (JWT) is one of the oldest and largest enduring advertising agencies in the United States. The Chicago Office opened in 1891.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The JWT Chicago Office opened in 1891 by Charles Raymond.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The J. Walter Thompson Company. Chicago Office. Marketing Vertical File was received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift/purchase/transfer] in 2001-2002.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], J. Walter Thompson Company. Chicago Office. Marketing Vertical File, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessions described in this collection guide: 2001-0263, 2002-0238

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related materials may be found in the following Hartman Center collections:

J. Walter Thompson Company. Chicago Office Records J. Walter Thompson Company. Chicago Office. Media Resources and Research Department records J. Walter Thompson Company. Marketing Vertical File J. Walter Thompson Company. Radio/Television Department records J. Walter Thompson Company. John Devine Papers J. Walter Thompson Company. Account Files

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Consists mainly of internal and trade research and subject reports. Topics covered include Broadcast and cable television, general marketing and market research, magazines, out of home media. Market research firms represented include Daniel Starch, Gallup, Marketing Science Institute, Nielsen, Roper and Yankelovich. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.
